head.title: Unitarian Universalist Community Church

img.alt: Unitarian Universalist Community Church of Park Forest

div.p:
Eco-Tour: "Toxics to Treasures"
Sunday, June 9th, 10:00 am to 3:00pm
Bus tour of pivotal environmental projects, hazards, mitigation, threats and solutions. $30.00, advance purchase required.
More info here...

Saturday, June 2nd
7:30-9:00pm Rainbow Café
First Saturday of each month.

Sunday, June 3rd
10:00am Worship and Religious Ed
Sermon: "Friendship"
by Rev. Yielbonzie Charles Johnson
with Alex Mercedes joining Chris Ussery on piano (Featuring a member and friends art show, RE Teacher Appreciation with Dan Feldt and Celebration of ministry of Yielbonzie Charles Johnson).

Sunday, June 9th
10:00 am to 3:00pm
Eco-Tour: "Toxics to Treasures"
Bus tour of pivotal environmental projects, hazards, mitigation, threats and solutions. $30.00, advance purchase required.
More info here...

Sunday, June 10th
10:00am Worship and Religious Ed
Sermon: "I Will Come Back Again"
(Reflections on the Possibility of an Afterlife" by February Sky. Susan Urban and Phil Cooper will share thoughts on one of religion's "big questions," and encourage the congregation to consider their own answers).

Friday, June 15th
7:00-9:00pm Drum Circle
The third Friday of each month.

Sunday, June 17th
10:00am Worship and Religious Ed
Sermon: "Marriage Again"
By Yielbonzie Charles Johnson
(Celebrating Father's Day and celebration of Gay Pride.

Saturday, June 23, 7:00 p.m
Free Movie & Discussion: The 11th Hour
Leonardo DeCaprio’s 2007 documentary on the global environmental crisis paints a portrait of a planet at risk while also offering some exciting and radical solutions for making life on earth sustainable. More...

Sunday, June 24th
10:00am Worship and Religious Ed
Sermon: TBA
By Beverly Scott
